Type.BattleDialog: ...Were the circumstances not so dire, I'd probably appreciate the irony of this situation better.
...Perhaps its time you too experienced a loss for the Library.
I have my own goals as you do yours... don't hold back.
From facing the Ensemble to facing my own Patrons and their assistants. I hate this.
Seeing you all again as my enemies hurts...
I'm sorry... but this is a sorrow I have to overcome to save my own Library...
Learn from this loss. Then perhaps my fate won't become your own...
...That's that and this is this. I have to keep going.
Victory... but at what cost?
It's you or them... it's you or them...
I suppose this is what I deserve. O Sorrow... I...
Will my death at least free them...?
No... No! I can't... I have to save them. I have to-
If I have to die... use the Page of my Book. Change fate.
Ah... this is what I put them through... I suppose it could be... worse...
More sins and blood on my hands...
It's just business. You know as well as I how this works...
I have to defend myself, so why does my heart ache so much?
At least I could make it quick.
It's just the way of things... right? It's me or them... and they'll be brought back, unlike me...
